CustomField.description: This field is optional. It is a picklist that specifies the type of contribution for a Roth Beneficiary IRA.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Specifies the type of contribution for a Roth Beneficiary IRA.
CustomField.label: Roth Beneficiary Contribution Type

value.fullName: Rollover/Direct Rollover from a Designated Roth Account
value.label: Rollover/Direct Rollover from a Designated Roth Account

value.fullName: Rollover/Direct Rollover from an Eligible Retirement Plan
value.label: Rollover/Direct Rollover from an Eligible Retirement Plan
